BackstoryDef.title: gestated
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born from a sprawling gestation facility, spending several weeks growing in one of the thousands of mechanite solution baths, being coded and trained to operate [PAWN_possessive] metallic outer shell. Upon passing the "Ransselaer test", [PAWN_pronoun] was declared operational and sent for corporatist use.

BackstoryDef.title: gestated soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated while [PAWN_possessive] planet was in the cross hairs of an orbital mechanoid invasion, thus [PAWN_pronoun] was quickly reformatted for combat, and sold to government and PMC groups as a soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to ride out the war a long time ago, but for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun]'s still there on the battlefields and ruins watching for the adversary.

BackstoryDef.title: custom creation
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was made with scrounged pieces and parts, but was mostly made from a hollow mechanent shell that was meant to be smelted down. [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a urbworld machinist, who treated [PAWN_objective] as their own child; teaching [PAWN_nameDef] how to move, speak, and perform basic actions - sadly [PAWN_pronoun] outlived [PAWN_possessive] creator, and was forced to strike out on [PAWN_possessive] own.

BackstoryDef.title: gestated servant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was marketed to suit the needs of wealthy families on a distant urbworld. And so [PAWN_nameDef] was bought and made a servant for a wealthy family for many years before being replaced in favor for a more robust version.

BackstoryDef.title: gestated pirate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated aboard a pirate corsair ship, and subsequently joined their ranks. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually proved [PAWN_possessive] worth as a expendable fighter, and something that doesn't need oxygen when a ship is being boarded, or torn open by orbital cannon fire.

BackstoryDef.title: gestated medic
BackstoryDef.description: After passing the "Ransselaer test" [PAWN_nameDef] was programmed as a capable medical unit. [PAWN_pronoun] worked as a dispatch medical-officer for a large hospital branch in a massive urbworld city, often being sent to the poor parts of the city for emergency healthcare.

BackstoryDef.title: gestated botanist
BackstoryDef.description: After passing the "Ransselaer test" [PAWN_nameDef] was programmed as a botanical care unit. [PAWN_pronoun] worked in a massive greenhouse complex on a densely populated urbworld. Growing crops, examining the plants for diseases, ordering the mechanized-harvesters, and controlling the greenhouse environment to maintain perfect humidity.

BackstoryDef.title: outlander
BackstoryDef.description: One day [PAWN_nameDef] wandered into a backwoods town and started working, drawing much fear and suspicion from the townsfolk. After a few years [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually accepted as "just another townie".

BackstoryDef.title: policing drone
BackstoryDef.description: After passing the "Ransselaer test" [PAWN_nameDef] was programmed as a police grade peacekeeping unit. [PAWN_pronoun] operated on a urbworld filled with strife and unrest. Often going up against large-scale protests, working with human and persona officers alike in their attempts to quell unrest, and 'pacifying' citizens with their batons.

BackstoryDef.title: factory overseer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to manage an urbworld factory. [PAWN_pronoun] prioritized efficiency above all else, overseeing the schedules and logistics of deliveries as they came and went. [PAWN_pronoun] was also deeply hated by the employees for [PAWN_possessive] impersonal touch.

BackstoryDef.title: artificial gladiator
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was made as a 'morally ethical' gladiator. [PAWN_possessive] battles were televised for urbworld and glitterworld citizens, [PAWN_pronoun] was one of the lucky few that was not outright annihilated in the fighting-ring, but was damaged enough to simply be thrown away.

BackstoryDef.title: refinery worker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to work in a massive refinery complex. The smoke billowing from the stacks made it inhospitable to humans outside of the factory's halls, so [PAWN_pronoun] had to work in the blacken air. Pouring the molten steel, regularly reigniting the smoke stacks, and repairing the furnaces when they inevitably exploded.

BackstoryDef.title: gas giant harvester
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to operate on the surface of a gas giant, or what little surface could be found. While the humans lived inside the habitat-elevators and controlled the descensions, [PAWN_nameDef] clung to the exteriors of the habitats for maintenance and operation while they plunged through the storms to harvest gases.

BackstoryDef.title: toxworld scavenger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to scavenge the ruined surface of a toxworld. Sent by third party interests, [PAWN_pronoun] delved into the ruins in search of artifacts and salvageable tech. To the inhabitants of the planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was seen as a harbinger for the spacers that often followed if something of value was found.

BackstoryDef.title: humanitarian dispatch
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to be dispatched to planets experiencing crises. [PAWN_pronoun] operated with a team of mechanents and drop-mechanoids; delivering water, food, and medicine to those suffering.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate drone
BackstoryDef.description: After passing the "Ransselaer test" [PAWN_nameDef] was programmed to perform menial tasks demanded by [PAWN_possessive] parent corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] was stationed in a sprawling office complex, ferrying mountains of bureaucratic paperwork between desks.

BackstoryDef.title: garbagemech
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated in an opulent urbworld city for trash collection from the residential zones. [PAWN_pronoun] rode a garbage-truck down the crowded streets and alleyways to collect garbage for incineration.

BackstoryDef.title: mechinator pylon
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated on a large urbworld city as a pylon for mechanoid control. [PAWN_pronoun] was not an actual mechinator with control over the city's various mechanoids, but rather a control pylon that accepted signals and relayed them to the mechanoids.

BackstoryDef.title: mechlegion remnant
BackstoryDef.description: Mechlegions are abnormalities, defined as mechhives under the control of subpersonae running on damaged syntax. [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to join the ranks of a mechlegion; only the legion itself had dissolved years prior, yet the foundries still worked. [PAWN_pronoun] stood awaiting orders for many years until a group of scavengers found [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: delivery driver
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to deliver goods via space-freighter within a solar system. It was a very tedious and uneventful job, but [PAWN_nameDef] didn't mind.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was gestated to speedily repair vehicles in a auto-repair shop on an opulent urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun]'s still drawn to tuning-up vehicles wherever [PAWN_pronoun] finds them.

BackstoryDef.title: subpersona slave
BackstoryDef.description: Subpersona are boons for any slavers looking to make easy money, as such when [PAWN_nameDef] was found by one such group, [PAWN_pronoun] was sold and then sent to perform hard labor. [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually emancipated by a third party and set free unto the world, without much aim or direction.
